solution_line_template: The total number of rabbits and antelopes is {rabbits}+{antelopes} = <<{rabbits}+{antelopes}={total_rabbits_antelopes}>>{total_rabbits_antelopes}
The number of hyenas was {hyenas_fewer_than_combined} fewer than the combined number of antelopes and rabbits, which is {total_rabbits_antelopes}-{hyenas_fewer_than_combined} = {hyenas}
The number of wild dogs was {wild_dogs_more_than_hyenas} more than the number of hyenas, that is {hyenas}+{wild_dogs_more_than_hyenas}= {wild_dogs}
The total number of animals Josie saw is {leopards}+{wild_dogs}+{hyenas}+{rabbits}+{antelopes} = <<{leopards}+{wild_dogs}+{hyenas}+{rabbits}+{antelopes}={total_animals}>>{total_animals}
